summary: An ordinance relating to the Eminent Domain proceedings for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for the laying off, opening, widening, extending, and establishing of the alley just northeasterly of Fuhrman Avenue, from Allison Street to Eastlake Avenue, and for establishing of the grades of said alley, pursuant to Ordinance No. 59080; providing for the rejection of the awards had therein, and providing for the discontinuance of such proceedings and repealing Ordinance No. 59080.
